overview: Since 2002 Bart has been helping clients buy and sell homes in the Southern Indiana/Greater Louisville, KY area. Since 2006 he’s consistently been a top producer with RE/MAX Advantage completing, on average, more than 50 transactions per year while most licensed agents in his market do less than 15 per year. Why do people choose to work with Bart and refer their friends/family to him? They know he cares and they know he’ll place their wants and needs above anything else in helping them find the right home. If you are in the market to buy and/or sell a home, please call Bart at 812-987-6387.
